title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5117.7 - Restrictions on acceptance of public assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5117.7 - Restrictions on acceptance of public assistance

State Regulations

Any video lottery gaming agent that cashes or accepts any
public assistance check or electronic benefit transfer device issued by a
public welfare official or department, or agent thereof, as and for public
assistance, as proscribed by section
151
of the

Social Services Law, shall be disciplined by the commission pursuant to Part
5113 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5117.7

Amended by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 9/24/2014. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
